q: '' Bill Stephan, a friend of Mike Pence 's since their law school days, said Mike Pence was always clear on what he stood for and what he was passionate about. I just remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve, Stephan said. Kobe Bryant managed just 18 points while committing six turnovers in 41 minutes.`` I don't approach the game like it's Kobe Bryant , and I want to have a Shaquille O'Neal game against him,'' Allen Iverson said. I want to play a good game against everybody. When you play well against another great player, it's only natural for you to feel good about the win. But that's not the most important thing for me.
